item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I’m Hex n I’m from the US! I also go by Hexa if there’s another “Hex” present. I am a “jack-of-all-trades” meaning i specialize in many different skills, such as digital and traditional art, 3d modeling, coding, story telling, and game making. I don’t have much going on in my life, but at the moment I’m majoring in bio-chemistry so I can eventually be an anesthesiologist. Thanks for checking out my blog
item.content:
Hi

I’m Hex n I’m from the US! I also go by Hexa if there’s another “Hex” present. I am a “jack-of-all-trades” meaning i specialize in many different skills, such as digital and traditional art, 3d modeling, coding, story telling, and game making.

I don’t have much going on in my life, but at the moment I’m majoring in bio-chemistry so I can eventually be an anesthesiologist.

Thanks for checking out my blog
